text: “Palibechimene mumapembedza kuonjezera pa Iye, koma mayina chabe amene inu ndi makolo anu mudapeka, amene Mulungu sadatumize umboni wa mayinawo. Chiweruzo chili m’manja mwa Mulungu yekha. Iye adakulamulirani kuti inu musamapembedze wina koma Iye yekha. Chimenecho ndicho chipembedzo changwiro, koma anthu ambiri sazindikira.”
